H0.text: Alleles are different versions of a gene.

H1.text: Modes are different versions of a gene.

H2.text: Ion are different versions of a gene known as.

H3.text: Genomes are different versions of a gene.

A4.text: An allele is a variant of the sequence of nucleotides at a particular location, or locus, on a DNA molecule.

A5.text: Alleles can differ at a single position through single-nucleotide polymorphisms, but they can also have insertions and deletions of up to several thousand base pairs.
